direction.raw_text: The Commander shuts the Goose up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The winch turns and the elevator starts to rise. A rhino guard tries to reach it, but just misses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leaping across the spears, Tai Lung catches the elevator as the volley of arrows flies down past him. The guards cut the rope and the elevator crashes back down to the bottom of the pit. Tai Lung swings up from the bottom of the elevator house and catches the guards by surprise. He grabs the chain and jumps over the edge and swings around, launching himself up to the next tier, disappearing into the shadows. Tai Lung lands on a bridge, fights his way through, finally reaching the top tier where the Commander and the rest of the Rhino army await.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Commander hushes the Goose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Archers set off charges on the ceiling. Massive stalactites crash down and the bridge begins to crumble. Tai Lung leaps across the crumbling debris and attempts one last huge jump towards the Commander. But he falls short, claws scraping and sparking against the rock wall. The Commander laughs maniacally. On his way down, Tai Lung looks up and sees a fuse burning down to the last group of explosives. He leaps across the raining debris up to the ceiling of the cavern. Grabbing a hold of the dynamite, Tai Lung falls and slings it ahead of him at the guards.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What's happening?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Fire Crossbows!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Tai Lung is free! I must warn Shifu!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're not going anywhere. And neither is he.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let go of me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to guards) Bring it up!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: #1 Wait! Bring it back!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's coming this way!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He won't get far. (to guards) Archers!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're dead. So very, very dead.

dialogue.raw_text: (to Goose) Heh heh...not yet we're not! Now!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes.

direction.raw_text: ! The door blasts open and Rhinos go flying everywhere.

dialogue.raw_text: URRK!

dialogue.raw_text: Stuck?! Whaa? Pfft... stuck... Yeah, I'm stuck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Crane) Help him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh dear.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Maybe on three. One. Two-
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Threeeee. Thank you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't mention it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No really, I appreci--
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: --EVER.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You actually thought you could learn to do a full split in one night? It takes years to develop one's flexibility and years longer to apply it in combat.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Put that down! The only souvenirs we collect here are bloody knuckles and broken bones.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, excellent!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let's get started.

Po falls in and is tossed around like a sack of soup. Shifu snaps. We see a series of shots of Po falling on his face at the hands of some invisible opponent, who turns out to be... Mantis. Shifu smiles. Flat on his back, Po manages a salute. Shifu has had it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po looks excited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Five exchange worried looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po doesn't even finish the step as Shifu whirls him around and throws him to the floor pinning his arm behind him.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Again, this time Shifu holds Po by the nose.

direction.raw_text: Po is totally inspired.

direction.raw_text: At his breaking point, Shifu flings Po into the air and then leaps at him with a flying kick.

dialogue.raw_text: Are you ready?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I was born ready--
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Eaghhh...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm sorry, brother! I thought you said you were ready!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That was awesome! Let's go again. (salutes)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've been taking it easy on you, panda, but no more! Your next opponent... will be me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Alright! Let's go!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Po) Step forth.

dialogue.raw_text: The true path to victory is to find your opponent's weakness and make him suffer for it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (delighted) Oh, yeah!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: To take his strength and use it against him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: --until he finally falls, or quits.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But a real warrior never quits. Don't worry, Master, I will never quit!

dialogue.raw_text: He's not gonna quit, is he?

Tai Lung leaps for the scroll, but Oogway stops him with strikes at his pressure points. He falls to the ground in a heap.

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) ...and when the boy showed talent in Kung Fu...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) ...Shifu trained him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) He believed in him. He told him he was destined for greatness.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) It was never enough for Tai Lung. He wanted the Dragon Scroll. But Oogway saw darkness in his heart and refused. Outraged, Tai Lung laid waste to the valley. He tried to take the scroll by force. And Shifu had to destroy what he had created.

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) But how could he?

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) Shifu loved Tai Lung like he'd never loved anyone before...

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) ...or since.

dialogue.raw_text: Master! Master!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hmmm?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (out of breath) I have-- it's-- it's very bad news.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ah, Shifu. There is just news. There is no good or bad.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Master, your vision...your vision was right. Tai Lung has broken out of prison. He's on his way!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That is bad news...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...If you do not believe that the Dragon Warrior can stop him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The panda? Master, that panda is not the Dragon Warrior. (MORE)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He wasn't even meant to be here -- it was an accident!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There are no accidents.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, I know. You've said that already. Twice.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, that was no accident either.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thrice.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: My old friend, the panda will never fulfill his destiny, nor you yours, until you let go of the illusion of control.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Illusion?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah. Look at this tree, Shifu. I cannot make it blossom when it suits me, nor make it bear fruit before its time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But there are things we can control.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can control when the fruit will fall.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And I can control--
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: --where to plant the seed. That is no illusion, Master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ah, yes. But no matter what you do, that seed will grow to be a peach tree. You may wish for an apple, or an orange... but you will get a peach.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But a peach cannot defeat Tai Lung!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Maybe it can. If you are willing to guide it, to nurture it. To believe in it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But how? How? I need your help, Master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, you just need to believe. Promise me, Shifu. Promise me you will believe.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ... I will try.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Good. My time has come. You must continue your journey without me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What... what are you..?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Master, you can't leave me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You must believe.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Master!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) ...So I'm like, fine, you may be a wolf, you may be the scariest bandit in Haijin Province...

dialogue.raw_text: ...but you're a lousy tipper.

dialogue.raw_text: Wow, you're a really good cook.

dialogue.raw_text: He is coming for the Dragon Scroll, and you are the only one who can stop him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And here I am saying you got no sense of humor. I'm gonna stop Tai...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What? You're serious? And I have to-- uh, Master Oogway will stop him! He did it before, he'll do it again.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oogway cannot, not anymore.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Our only hope is the Dragon Warrior.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The panda?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, the panda!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Master, please. Let us stop Tai Lung. This is what you've trained us for.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No! It is not your destiny to defeat Tai Lung. It is his.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where'd he go?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . BUNKHOUSE  DAY Super wide shot as Po runs away from the compound. Closer as he continues running. He checks over his shoulder, turns back... Shifu lands right in front of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He tries to maneuver around Shifu, but is redirected back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pushes Po back with the staff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu pokes him again, this time causing Po to fall on his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po shoves the staff away and gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po looks down at the Valley, then turns back to Shifu.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In frustration, Shifu yells out the answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu walks away, leaving the path open to Po.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You cannot leave! A real warrior never quits!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Watch me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on! How am I supposed to beat Tai Lung? I can't even beat you to the stairs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You will beat him because you are the Dragon Warrior!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ow! You don't believe that! You never believed that! From the first moment I got here, you've been trying to get rid of me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes. I was. But now I ask you to trust in your master as I have come to trust in mine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're not my master. And I'm not the Dragon Warrior.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then why didn't you quit? You knew I was trying to get rid of you, and yet you stayed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, I stayed. I stayed because every time you threw a brick at my head or said I smelled, it hurt. But it could never hurt more than it did every day of my life just being me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I stayed because I thought if anyone could change me, could make me... not me, it was you. The greatest kung fu teacher in all of China.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But I can change you! I can turn you into the Dragon Warrior! And I will!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: C'mon, Tai Lung is on his way here right now. And even if it takes him a hundred years to get here, how are you gonna change this... (indicate belly) ...into the Dragon Warrior? How? How? How?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know!!! (then, resigned) I don't know.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's what I thought.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tigress stands in the moonlight outside the palace. She has seen what just transpired between Shifu and Po.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She turns away, a look of resolve on her face... and LEAPS. She flies through the air, finally landing on a rooftop in the valley below. She looks back up at the palace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She takes off running. The other four are right behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She keeps going and they give chase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The chase continues through the village.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then...the others join her. Tigress smiles. They leap off into the night.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is what you trained me for.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Tigress!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't try and stop me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're not trying to stop you!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're coming with you!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Night dissolves to dawn. Shifu sits under the peach tree. He stirs, hearing KUNG FU NOISES from the training hall. He goes to investigate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu looks inside -- it's empty. The NOISES continue from somewhere else -- the bunkhouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Shifu turns the corner he sees Po's shadow as he performs some amazing Kung Fu. Entering the kitchen, Shifu finds Po is stuffing his face with food. Seeing Shifu, he stops mid-munch. In silence they eye each other. Shifu surveys the room -- broken lock, smashed doors, unhinged cabinets. Po belches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu gets a glimmer in his eye. He has an idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu calmly exits and hides just outside the doorway, waiting to see if his hunch is correct.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (mouth full) What? I eat when I'm upset, okay?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, no need to explain. I just thought you might be Monkey -- he hides his almond cookies on the top shelf.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! KLONK! THUNK! Shifu peeks back inside and finds Po perched atop the high shelves jamming more cookies into his mouth. Po notices Shifu walking back in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He glances back down at Shifu, whose disbelief turns to a wise smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks at the cookie and then can't help but eat it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He and Po stare at each other for a beat. Then... WHOOMP! Po slips and crashes to the kitchen floor. A cookie rolls over to Shifu. He picks it up.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (mouth full) Don't tell Monkey.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look at you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, I know. I disgust you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No no, I mean... how did you get up there?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know. I guess I-- I don't know. I was getting a cookie...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And yet you are ten feet off the ground and have done a perfect split.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, this... this is just an accident.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There are no accidents. Come with me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Shifu leads Po through the mountains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu just continues walking.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I know you're trying to be all mystical and kung fu-y, but could you at least tell me where we're going?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Shifu is sitting beneath a tree. Winded and wheezing, Po slowly works his way up the hill. Po sets his gear down and looks around. Shifu breathes in the morning mist as Po approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po begins to pat his armpits with water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po quickly stops. Realizing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The camera cranes up to reveal they are standing on rock shapes that resemble a yin yang symbol. As the camera pulls further out, it pulls back through a vision of Oogway doing Kung Fu moves.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You dragged me all the way out here for a bath?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Panda, we do not wash our pits in The Pool of Sacred Tears.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (in awe) The pool of...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is where Oogway unravelled the mysteries of harmony and focus. This is the birthplace of Kung Fu.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Shifu leaps atop one of the rocks and looks down at Po.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tears of joy well up in Po's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po sniffs the tears back and smiles.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Do you want to learn Kung Fu?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (awestruck) Yeah...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then I am your master!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't cry.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Shifu leads Po out into an open field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po scowls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu produces a bowl of dumplings.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: When you focus on Kung Fu, when you concentrate...you stink.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But perhaps that is my fault. I cannot train you the way I have trained the Five. I now see that the way to get through to you is with this!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh great, `cause I'm hungry.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Good. When you have been trained, you may eat. Let us begin.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Po's training unfolds -- deep breathing exercises, balance tests, push ups, sit ups, climbing, etc. Through it all, he never gets to eat, although he does indeed learn kung fu.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu sets a bowl of dumplings on a boulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po stops short, suspicious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po grabs one of the dumplings in his chopsticks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po raises the dumpling to his mouth. WHOOSH! Shifu snatches the dumpling away and eats it himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po reaches again as Shifu leaps across the table and kicks the dumpling into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu eats it and Po scowls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po and Shifu ready their chopsticks. Po slams the table and sends the bowl of dumplings airborne. Back and forth, Po and Shifu spar, vying for the dumplings. Until there is only one left. Shifu tries every trick to keep the dumpling away from Po. He hides it underneath one of the bowls. He uses his chopsticks as weapons to smack Po's chopsticks away. He attacks Po with his bamboo staff. But Po skillfully manages to best Shifu for the final dumpling. Shifu smiles. Po has passed the final test. But then Po tosses the dumpling into Shifu's open hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Master and pupil bow to each other.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: After you, panda.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just like that? No situps? No ten mile hike?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I vowed to train you... and you have been trained. You are free to eat.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Enjoy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I said you are free to eat. Have a dumpling.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You are free to eat!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (upset) Am I?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (challenging) Are you?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not hungry... master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Five race toward a rope bridge stretched between mountain peaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Tai Lung appears at the other end of the bridge. He ROARS and races toward them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The others slash at the ropes securing the bridge to the mountain. Tai Lung is almost upon them when Tigress cuts the final rope. But Tai Lung is too close -- Tigress must launch herself into him. The two cats end up in the middle of the bridge just as it starts to tumble into the canyon below. The Five grab support ropes and hold on for dear life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung laughs. It echoes off the mountain walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Five exchange quick, worried looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Five exchange quick, confused looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tigress charges at him. The battle begins. Tigress punches Tai Lung as he hangs from the bridge. But Tai Lung counters with a maneuver that sends Tigress slamming backwards through the bridge's wooden slats. Then Tigress gets choked by the bridge's ropes. Monkey turns to Crane and Viper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Viper grabs Tai Lung, which causes him to let go of the ropes. Tigress plummets down into the gorge... but Crane manages to catch her. Viper punches Tai Lung repeatedly with his own fist. Tai Lung manages to get a paw around Viper's "throat".
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Cut it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where's the Dragon Warrior?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How do you know you're not looking at her?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You think I'm a fool? I know you're not the Dragon Warrior. None of you!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (nodding confidently) I heard how he fell out of the sky on a ball of fire, that he's a warrior unlike anything the world has ever seen.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Po?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So that is his name -- Po. Finally, a worthy opponent. Our battle will be legendary!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We've got this. Help her!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Monkey!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . Mantis is straining to hold the rope by himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Monkey leaps into action, kicking Tai Lung in the chest and sending him crashing through the slats of the bridge. He gets back to his feet and starts running back to them on a single strand of rope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mantis whips his end of the rope, sending a sine wave shooting toward Tai Lung. The rope whips Tai Lung in the face and he gets tangled up. The Five see their chance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Working as a team, the Five kick Tai Lung's butt every which way. Tigress finally slashes the last rope holding up Tai Lung. He plummets down... down... disappearing into the mist. Mantis whips his end of the rope, returning his buddies safely to the mountain. The Five look relieved. But the relief is short-lived... Tigress notices that the other end of the bridge is circling the far mountain peak. Her eyes go wide with dread. The rope whips up. But Tai Lung isn't there. With a crash, he suddenly appears behind the Five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung jabs a finger at Monkey, who instantly freezes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Tai lung lunges toward the rest.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Go! (then) Ack! What was I thinking?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Mantis!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Now!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Shifu taught you well...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But he didn't teach you everything.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Shifu and Po walk through the palace courtyard. Po has an easy spring in his step.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He swings his belly around and knocks Shifu off balance. Shifu staggers back, regaining his dignity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After a moment's thought, though, he leans toward Po -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he punches him playfully on the arm. Po smiles at him. As they LAUGH, an indistinct figure appears in the clouds behind them. IT'S CRANE! Crane carries the five to the palace grounds, crashing in a heap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po throws his backpack aside and runs over to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crane struggles to lift his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His head collapses to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu starts freeing the Five. First Viper, then Mantis, then Monkey releases suddenly from his paralysis -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He delivers a Kung Fu punch to Po's head and then slowly realizes where he is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu kneels before Tigress and works to free her.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You have done well, Panda.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Done well? Done well?! I've done awesome!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The mark of a true hero is humility!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But yes...you have done awesome.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Huh? Guys? Guys!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're dead? No, they're breathing! They're asleep?! No, their eyes are open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We were no match for his nerve attack.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He has gotten stronger.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who? Tai Lung? Stronger?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's too fast!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sorry, Po.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I thought we could stop him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He could have killed you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why didn't he?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So you could come back here and strike fear into our hearts. But it won't work!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Uh, it might, I mean, a little. I'm pretty scared.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can defeat him, panda.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Are you kidding? If they can't-- They're five masters. I'm just one me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But you will have the one thing that no one else does.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: -UP of the Dragon Scroll. Po stares at Shifu - then looks up at the Scroll. Then back at Shifu -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They look at each other. This is a big moment. Oogway's staff hangs in a rack surrounded by candles. As Po and The Five stand by, Shifu carries the staff over to the reflecting pool. Shifu bows his head, then, eyes still closed, he raises the staff up above his head. Po and the others watch, expectantly. The peach blossom petals rise in a flickering, spinning cloud up from the pool. The gentle tornado rises up around the ceiling carving that holds the Dragon Scroll. The petals loosen the scroll from the dragon's mouth and it falls. At the last second, Shifu reaches out with the staff to catch the scroll on the end of it. He turns to Po, holding it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po takes a deep breath. Then he grasps the tube and tries to pull the top off it. It doesn't budge. He strains at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He strains again. He tries to bite it off...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu SIGHS and holds out his hand. Po passes him the tube. Shifu pops the end off effortlessly and passes it back to Po.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He glances at the Five. They look on in awe. Monkey gives him the `thumbs up.' Po starts to unroll the scroll, the golden light bathing his face. Across the scroll we see Shifu, excited that he is witness to history... On Po's face as he finishes opening the scroll. Then -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu looks concerned. The Five look concerned. Po looks utterly terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Po tries to show Shifu the scroll. Shifu covers his eyes and turns his head away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he can't help himself. He takes a peek. Then he GRABS if off Po. He turns it around, then upside down. He closes it and opens it again, astonished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu turns away, contemplative. What can this mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po sits heavily on the floor, dejected.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Five don't argue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu puts the scroll back in its container and seals it. He looks oddly calm as he turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Five and Po look devastated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu salutes them and turns away. Po is heartbroken. Crane steps forward and kindly puts a wing around Po, pulling away. Po resists for a moment, then lets the Five lead him off.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You really believe I'm ready?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You are, Po.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Behold. The Dragon Scroll... It is yours.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wait, what happens when I read it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No one knows, but legend says you will be able to hear a butterfly's wing-beat.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whoa! Really? That's cool.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes. And see light in the deepest cave. You will feel the universe in motion around you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wow! Can I punch through walls? Can I do a quadruple back flip? Will I have invisibility--
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Focus. Focus.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Huh? Oh, yeah... yeah.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Read it, Po, and fulfill your destiny. Read it and become... the Dragon Warrior!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whooaa!!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's impossible to open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on baby. Come on now...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thank you. I probably loosened it up for you though... Okay, here goes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's blank!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Here! Look!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No! I am forbidden to look upon--
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Blank? I don't...I don't understand.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay. So like, Oogway was just a crazy old turtle after all?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. Oogway was wiser than us all.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, come on! Face it. He picked me by accident. Of course I'm not the Dragon Warrior. Who am I kidding?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But who will stop Tai Lung?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He'll destroy everything...and everyone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, evacuate the Valley. You must protect the villagers from Tai Lung's rage.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What about you master?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I will fight him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can hold him off long enough for everyone to escape.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But Shifu, he'll kill you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then I will finally have paid for my mistake.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Listen to me, all of you. It is time for you to continue your journey without me. I am very proud to have been your master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Five arrive at the base of the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Monkey picks up a small child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They split up and begin helping the villagers evacuate. Po is left by himself. He makes his way through the bustling town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po approaches the Noodle Shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seeing Po, Po's Dad hurries over and wraps his arms around his son. Po bends down to reciprocate the hug, as Po's dad pulls away, having fastened an apron around Po's waist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po's Dad goes back to packing things up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad starts to walk off, unaware that Po isn't following.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He turns and notices that Po hasn't moved. He walks to Po sympathetically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po slumps against the cart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad is taken aback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad pauses dramatically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po feigns excitement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po looks at his father with dawning realization. He picks up the Scroll. For a moment, Po stares at his reflection on the scroll, then he smiles serenely. He gets it now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po turns back to look at the palace.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We've got to get them out safely.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come, little one. Let's find your mama.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Viper, gather the southern farmers. Mantis, the north. Crane, light the way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (skeptically) Look, it's the Dragon Warrior.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey, Dad.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Po!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Good to have you back, son!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (listlessly) Good to be back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let's go Po. So, for our next shop, it's time to face it -- the future of noodles is dice-cut vegetables, no longer slices.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Also, I was thinking, maybe this time we'll have a kitchen you can actually stand up in. Hmm? You like that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Po, I'm sorry things didn't work out. It just... wasn't meant to be.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Po, forget everything else. Your destiny still awaits. We are noodle folk -- broth runs deep through our veins.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know, Dad. Honestly, sometimes I can't believe I'm actually your son.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Po, I think it's time I told you something I should have told you a long time ago...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The secret ingredient of my secret ingredient soup!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: C'mere! The secret ingredient is... nothing!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Huh?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You heard me. Nothing. There is no secret ingredient!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wait wait...it's just plain old noodle soup? You don't add some kind of special sauce or something?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't have to. To make something special, you just have to believe it's special.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There is no secret ingredient...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: At the top of the stairs, Shifu looks upon the Valley, awaiting his fate. With a gust of wind, Tai Lung appears before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They fight. At last. Tai Lung punches Shifu clean through the doors of the Jade Palace. Tai Lung enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dissolve to FLASHBACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A young Tai Lung looks expectant. Oogway shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung looks to Shifu who averts his eyes and the past dissolves into the present.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu takes a Kung Fu stance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enraged, Tai Lung knocks over the Kung Fu artifacts and throws them at Shifu.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu dodges each attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung pulls Oogway's staff from the shrine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They fight. Tai Lung pins Shifu down with the staff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They struggle for a beat until finally, the staff splinters into a hundred pieces. Shifu looks back at the pieces and a flutter of peach tree petals fly by. Caught off guard, Shifu gets kicked by Tai Lung into a column.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Shifu climbs the column to the rafters. Tai Lung follows and sends them both crashing through the roof. Lightning flash. Grappling in mid-air, Tai Lung gets his hands around Shifu's throat as they crash back through the roof. They kick apart. Shifu crashes to the floor and lands hard. Tai Lung bounces off the wall and throws a lantern to the floor. Flames go everywhere. Tai Lung's arms are aflame as he charges at Shifu.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I have come home, Master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is no longer your home. And I am no longer your master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes. You have a new favorite. So where is this...Po? Did I scare him off?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This battle is between you and me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So. That is how it's going to be?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That is how it must be.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I rotted in jail for twenty years because of your weakness!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Obeying your master is not weakness!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You knew I was the Dragon Warrior! You always knew...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) But when Oogway said otherwise, what did you do? What did you do?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: NOTHING!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You were not meant to be the Dragon Warrior! That was not my fault!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: WHO FILLED MY HEAD WITH DREAMS?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ?! WHO DENIED ME MY DESTINY?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: WHO DROVE ME TO TRAIN UNTIL MY BONES CRACKED

dialogue.raw_text: It was never my decision to make!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It is now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Give me the scroll!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I would rather die.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All I ever did, I did to make you proud! Tell me how proud you are, Shifu! Tell me! TELL ME!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! A fiery punch sends Shifu skidding across the floor and crashing against the reflecting pool. The flames extinguish and Tai Lung extends his claws.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung stops in his tracks. Shifu waits. Tai Lung's expression goes cold. He grabs Shifu by the throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He holds Shifu up to the ceiling. Looking up, Tai Lung bristles when he sees the scroll is missing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung slams Shifu to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Tai Lung is furious. He roars, ready to strike Shifu. Suddenly...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung turns around to find Po standing in the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung casts Shifu aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po shows him the Dragon Scroll. From out of nowhere, Tai Lung appears and punches Po across the room, grabbing the scroll knocked from Po's hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po bounces off a nearby pillar and slams back into Tai Lung, sending him flying into a column. Po puts on a brave face and strikes a pose as Tai Lung recovers and charges. Po turns to run. Tai Lung quickly catches up and they both sail off the Palace steps. Po clings to the scroll as Tai Lung delivers a kick and sends him crashing onto the theater rooftops below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Po rolls down off a tree and uses the recoil to whip back and smash Tai Lung. He briefly skids across the rooftop and comes right back at Po.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Down the Theater steps, Po and Tai Lung grapple for the scroll. Po is oblivious to the effects of crashing down stairs and in slow motion, his voluminous butt presses down on Tai Lung's head. As they crash through the Gateway the scroll is knocked loose. Tai Lung goes for the scroll but Po snatches it away using a noodle lasso. The scroll flies towards him and bounces off his head. Tai Lung leaps for it, but Po grabs his tail and pulls him back down onto a cart which see-saws Po into the air. In mid-air, Po slurps the noodle. Up and over the rooftops, Po lands in a grove of bamboo trees and into a nearby wok shop. The scroll rolls to a stop in the street. As Tai Lung makes his move on the scroll, Po turns the array of overturned woks into a shell game, sliding the woks around to hide the scroll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung knocks the woks away and exposes the scroll as Po uses his bamboo stilts to block Tai Lung. The leopard swipes out the stilts and brings Po down on top of him as the scroll rolls down the steps towards the river. Po gets thrown into a fireworks booth. As Tai Lung chases down the scroll, he turns back to see Po flying through the fireworks-filled sky. Po slams through Tai Lung and crashes into a rock wall. The scroll flies out of his hand and lands in the mouth of an ornamental rooftop dragon. He looks back at Tai Lung, who sees where the scroll has landed. Via the magic of cookie- vision, Po effortlessly scales the building. Tai Lung is shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He takes a giant leap and kicks the wall. The resulting shockwave collapses the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Amazingly, Po skips across the falling roof tiles to reach the scroll in mid-air as Tai Lung leaps up behind him and unleashes a punishing blow that sends Po smashing into the ground. As Tai Lung lands, he delivers a final devastating punch. As the dust settles, Tai Lung is looming over Po in the impact crater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung grabs for the scroll and opens it. His face falls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po stirs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po gets to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung snarls and lunges at Po.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung attacks Po's nerve points. But Po begins giggling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tai Lung's nerve attack has no effect on Po. Frustrated, he delivers a double-fisted punch to Po's belly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The shockwave ripples through Po's entire body and Po's arms come back and strike Tai Lung, sending the leopard crashing back into a building. Po looks at his hands, amazed at what he just did. Tai Lung rises from the rubble and runs at Po again. But Po strikes back, using an unorthodox panda-style technique, even getting Tai Lung to chomp down on his own tail. Po gives Tai Lung a butt bump that sends him crashing into a building. Tai Lung emerges and attempts one more lunge at Po. But Po prepares... and Tai Lung is swiftly met by Po's IRON BELLY! He is launched into the air. Po waits... and waits... until finally, Tai Lung appears in the sky and crashes to the ground. Tai Lung is battered, but still defiant.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (weakly) I have always been proud of you. From the first moment, I've been proud of you. And it was my pride that blinded me. I loved you too much to see what you were becoming. What I was turning you into. I'm... sorry.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't want your apology. I want my scroll!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: WHAT? WHERE IS IT?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (weakly) Dragon Warrior has taken scroll halfway across China by now. You will never see that scroll, Tai Lung. Never. Never...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Hey!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (out of breath) Stairs...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who are you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Buddy, I am the Dragon Warrior. (exhales hard) Huhhh...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You?! Him?! (to Shifu) He's a panda. (back to Po) You're a panda. What are you gonna do, big guy? Sit on me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't tempt me. Haha. No. I'm gonna use this. You want it? Come and get it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Finally!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That scroll is mine!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Lightning!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The scroll has given him power. (then)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (out of breath) Finally... oh yes... the power of the Dragon Scroll... is mine!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's NOTHING!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's okay. I didn't get it the first time either.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (disbelief) What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There is no secret ingredient. It's just you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Stop! Stop it! I'm gonna pee! Don't! Don't!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (heavy breathing) You... can't defeat me. You're just a big, fat panda!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! Po grabs Tai Lung's finger. Tai Lung's eyes go wide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po's pinky pops up. Tai Lung gasps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He flexes his pinky...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not a big, fat panda. I'm the big, fat panda.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The Wuxi Finger Hold!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, you know this hold?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're bluffing. You're bluffing! Shifu didn't teach you that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nope. I figured it out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Skadoosh!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A mushroom cloud appears over the Valley, sweeping past the Furious Five and the fleeing villagers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Villagers emerge from hiding. Po walks out from the mist looking very much like the warrior from the opening dream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As he nears, we see that his hat is an upside down wok and his scarf is a torn apron. Villagers CHEER the Dragon Warrior. Po's Dad emerges from the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po hugs his dad. The wok falls off Po's head and rolls on the ground until Mantis appears in frame and stops it. The rest of the Five are with him. Po takes notice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tigress bows deeply. The others follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po races toward the Jade Palace. He climbs the steps. Then more steps.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look! The Dragon Warrior.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's my boy. That big, lovely kung fu warrior is my son!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks, Dad.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey, guys.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (modest) Master? (then, remembering) Master Shifu!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Po arrives breathless at the Jade Palace. Shifu is still lying in the scroll room, his eyes closed. Po rushes to his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu weakly opens his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu smiles and shakes his head in disbelief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shifu closes his eyes. He is still. Po starts freaking out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Po nods reverently as Shifu closes his eyes again. Master and pupil lie next to each other. The camera pulls up and back away from them. Po tries to remain still, but it's hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He's about to say something, but he stops himself. He fidgets for a beat, then can't control himself any longer.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Master! Shifu! Shifu! Are you okay?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Po! You're alive! (then, darkly) Or we're both dead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, Master, I didn't die. I defeated Tai Lung!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You did?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wow. It is as Oogway foretold -- You are the Dragon Warrior. You have brought peace to this Valley. And to me. Thank you. Thank you, Po. Thank you...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No! Master! No No No! Don't die, Shifu. Please...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (eyes snapping open) I'm not dying, you idiot-- ah, Dragon Warrior. I'm simply at peace. Finally.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh. So, um, I should...stop talking?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If you can.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Want to get something to eat?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (sighs) Yeah.
dialogue.name: dialogue
